content: DRTC on a consolidated basis reported a net loss of $0.7 million compared to net income of $0.2 million in Q3 of last year, and net loss of $0.5 million in Q2 of this year, with the losses being driven by cost outside of the cybersecurity services business related to work on strategic growth initiatives including DRTCs work on the Bankâs Digital Deposit Receipts, as well as other technology development initiatives that are not yet contributing to revenue.
